title: Can we nerf azir please.
body: ''Azir needs damage reduced his wall was not the problem. Hes getting nerfed in the wrong places. hes far too safe and with his insta proc on thunderlords hes bursty at all points of the game but after the burst he has consistent damage and a perma slow with rylais. reduce his solider range and initial burst. Azir does not need to be a long range siege, anti siege, burst, consistent damage, objective taking mage. He still takes towers far faster than any other mage because hes attack speed based and the same can be said about dragons and barons. Also he uses next to no mana in lane unless he spams Q in which case your health will be gone before his mana. He has everything but actual health sustain going for him right now and its all in the name of having a high skill cap but by that logic annie and garen should be the weakest champions in the game due to how easy they are.''

Azir is not balanceable. His sheer kit strength is absolutely insane and has been nerfed numerous time, knockup removed, wall duration reduced for instance, yet he's still extremely powerful. He's basically so dependent on skill and insane when very well played that it's basically "if you want to become one of the best players in your server, play Azir" and "you shouldn't play Azir unless you're very good with him" at the same time.
